name: Terrible Maze Game
description:
This game was a test and a school project that was made in Game Maker Studio. This was made in about two days after I lost all the files and completed game multiple times. <3

Instructions:

Move: Arrow Keys

Teleport: Please Stand on the Blue Glitch Tiles and press Z.

That's all!

P.S. Better, more thought out games to come, I promise!
